alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 12:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Nassau, northeastern Duval, southern Camden and east central Charlton Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 1255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kings Ferry to Oceanway. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Fernandina Beach, Kings Bay Base, Yulee, Kings Ferry, Amelia City, Dungeness, Cumberland Island and Harrietts Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton
